messages.title: ELECTION COMMUNICATION
messages.content: Martin, a father of two young children, himself born and raised in Westhoughton wishes to represent you in Parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Keep the NHS publicly owned, FREE at the point of delivery for all eligible users
A Fair & equal immigration policy giving everyone the same opportunity, using a points based system
ONLY UKIP was 100% committed to BREXIT, every other party campaigned against it.

issues.brexitEurope: ONLY UKIP was 100% committed to BREXIT, every other party campaigned against it.
issues.health: Keep the NHS publicly owned, FREE at the point of delivery for all eligible users
issues.immigration: A Fair & equal immigration policy giving everyone the same opportunity, using a points based system

leaflet.personalStatement: Martin, a father of two young children, himself born and raised in Westhoughton wishes to represent you in Parliament.

images.caption: Introducing MARTIN TIGHE - UKIP Candidate for Bolton West
